newTabPageTitle.description: Text to show in tab title on new tab page

appsEditorURLLabel.description: Label for URL field in shortcuts editor

appsEditorIconLabel.description: Label for icon field in shortcuts editor

appsEditorAutofindIconButton.description: Text for button for automatic icon-fetching in shortcuts editor

appsEditorCancelButton.description: Text for cancel button in shortcuts editor

appsEditorSaveButton.description: Text for save button in shortcuts editor

drawerRecentlyClosedHeading.description: Heading for recently closed sites in drawer

drawerTopSitesHeading.description: Heading for most visited sites in drawer

drawerChromeAppsHeading.description: Heading for Chrome Apps in drawer

bookmarksEmptyMessage.message: Search for bookmarks and results will appear here
bookmarksEmptyMessage.description: Message shown when bookmarks drawer is empty, asking user to type to search

bookmarksNoResultsMessage.description: Message shown when bookmarks search returned no results

bookmarksNoBookmarksMessage.description: Message shown when user has no bookmarks

appSearchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder in Chrome Apps search bar, shown when empty

bookmarksSearchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder in bookmarks search bar, shown when empty

findBarPlaceholder.description: Placeholder in Find bar, shown when empty

optionsToggleCloseTabUponAppLaunch.message: Close tab after launching app(the tab remains open)

optionsHelpNewsRSSURLs.message: Enter the full URLs of the RSS feeds, one per line.

optionsHelpWeatherLocationOverrides.message: Note: 'Remember to put the correct coordinates or else the weather will not be displayed accurately.

optionsHelpCustomCSS.message: Enter your custom CSS stylesheet here.

optionsTitle.description: Text shown in tab title on options page alongside extension name

optionsHelpContact.message: If you have any questions,concerns or feedback to improve this app feel free to contact me from the two options above.

importexportButtonBack.description: Button shown in Import/export options taking user back to options page

importexportHeadingImport.description: Heading shown above import data input field

importexportOverwriteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to overwrite your current options?
importexportOverwriteConfirmation.description: Message in confirmation dialog asking user to confirm they want to overwrite old options

importexportSuccessMessage.description: Message shown in alert dialog confirming success of options import
